website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive choice if you are looking for an extra-strength tablet with a large capsule count.
pros: Capsules are free of gluten, dairy, eggs, peanuts, and soy
Many customers noticed a difference in hair length and shine
cons: Some buyers experienced severe headaches after using

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss from thyroid cancer
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with thyroid cancer about 3 months ago. My hair had gotten really thin and after my surgery, 12 weeks ago, it came out in clumps. I read the reviews on this product and had to try it for such a good price. It took about 2 weeks, but I noticed a difference in the volume of my hair. I recently had to stop taking it due to a low iodine diet prior to radiation, but when that's all over, I plan on starting it again! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Adams

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for hair growth.. It works
customer_reviews.text: This thing works to make your hair grow. I was hesitant when I first ordered because I wasn't sure if it was going to work or not but it did. It makes hair everywhere in your body grow, LOL, so if you just shaved, it's also going to grow faster. I had cut off my hair really short and in less than 6 months it was already shoulder length again, so I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S.

customer_reviews.title: Been successful for over a year
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Zenwise Biotin for over a year with no negative side affects. I started taking it because of hair loss. I take two pills a day. I tried going down to one a day but noticed more hair loss. When taking two a day I don't lose as much hair especially in the shower and my hair dresser noticed new growth. I read a review that listed gelatin as an ingredient but I have never had a bottle with gelatin which is good since I am a vegetarian.
customer_reviews.author: Deenie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty hands again
customer_reviews.text: I am a 65 year old female and my fingernails were just awful. They were very thin and constantly splitting. I've tried other biotin supplements but this is the only that has made a really big difference. I will definitely continue to use this great product.
customer_reviews.author: sue3510

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy. Just yesterday
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Biotin (and only this particular brand) since July 5, 2015. I recently noticed my fingernails are growing very quickly. I am not sure they are any stronger but since they're long, I'm happy. Just yesterday, I noticed the difference to my hair. It is shiny and bouncy and very health-looking. Normally, in my mid-50s with blond-going-a-little-grey-hair, I don't pay much attention to it but it it is so different, it was very noticeable. I have used the same quality shampoo for 9 years, so that's not it. It has gotta be the biotin.
customer_reviews.author: Becky D Mc

customer_reviews.title: New Diet Restrictions
customer_reviews.text: I had to make a radical change in my diet for health reasons, and one of the results was losing quite a bit of my hair. It was recommended to me to take a Biotin supplement. The tricky part was finding one that didn’t have ingredients contained that we’re not part of my strict diet. This was the few brands I could actually take. Now I have long, pretty hair, that is strong and healthy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Colby

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought Biotin 5000 to reduce hair loss (I am in my 50s and started to have my hair coming out in combfulls). I believe it is working, hair started falling out in about two weeks. I continue to take it. It is easy to take and was delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value and I was pleased the item had very few additives and other chemical.
customer_reviews.author: Patches

customer_reviews.title: A post-chemo must!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Biotin after chemo...my hair grew back beautifully...I tell everyone to take it.

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was told by my doctor and hair stylist that Biotin would help my hair and nails. I was hoping it would work but was definitely surprised at the results I have had so far. My nails were very thin and are now healthy again. My hair is growing and is very healthy. A great product!

My nails were thin/weak and would split easily before I started taking it but now they are strong and do not break at all. My skin was dry and flaky, now is baby soft and youthful and smooth. I love it and recommend it to those with similar problems.

Since taking this supplement, I've noticed my nails have gotten longer and stronger. Hopefully, it will have the same effect on my hair as it did on my nails. I'm looking forward to seeing what happens in the near future.

Also I want to mention that it has never upset my stomach. I highly recommend buying this product!

So I ordered your Biotin to see if it would help. It took several weeks to notice a real difference, but my hair is back and my nails are stronger. I will continue to use your Biotin to prevent this from ever happening again.

Before my nails would grow out with a dent (I think I'm deficient in some kind of vitamin) but it's growing out normally again. I think it's too soon to tell for my skin.

I replied back, and sure enough, they sent me a free bottle which arrived super quick too! I will definitely buy again!

customer_reviews.text: Ordered two bottles one for me and one for my dad gave us both a bunch of allergy rashes close to the ankles. Tried it on and off every time I took off the rashes went away. Every time I started two days later I was breaking out in rashes. Horrible experience!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie P

customer_reviews.title: Puzzled and concerned by changes in bottling and labeling
customer_reviews.text: The newest shipment I just received arrived in a smaller bottle with the front label now showing 5000 MCG instead of 5 MG. I know that's supposed to be the same equivalent, but why the re-labeling? And why is the barcode on the newest bottle's label stickered-over with a different bar code? Is there some difference in the manufacturing or ingredients from the bottle I originally purchased --- whose label matches the illustration on Amazon's and Zenwise Lab's web sites, whereas the new label does not?
customer_reviews.author: Cook County Consumer

customer_reviews.title: They work!!
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I almost NEVER write reviews but, I feel compelled to do so now. I'm a black woman, who has natural hair (meaning no chemicals). I've been wearing crocheted braids for about 4 months. Ever since I've been wearing them, my hair started to thin, and I didn't know what to do. I started taking this Biotin 3 weeks ago, and my hair is noticeably thicker and has grown almost an inch!! My cow licks were thin, and have filled in a little. I'm happy about that. Also, the dosage is only 1 per day, so 1 bottle will last 4 months, if taken as directed. Also, I've had no side effects. Hope my review helps.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this brand after trying 3 others prior. This brand is definitely AAA+++ Rating. It does not contain Soy and other ingredients that I am allergic to. Thank you to the makers of this product. My nails grow like green plants and my hair is a lot more manageable after washing and conditioning. I have experienced far less breakage in the past month while using this product. I am thoroughly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: KRR

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this product. I read in the reviews that it gave people skin problems. I thought I'd give it a go anyways because I really wanted to try something good for my hair. I tried this product for a little over two weeks, to give it a fair chance. I took one pill before bedtime with a glass of water each night. Almost immediately my skin went from its usual perfectly-clear to breakouts everywhere. So. Many. Breakouts. It was like night and day. To me, the hair/skin/nails benefits are not worth the nightmare break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Blu

customer_reviews.title: Imbalance
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews I was excited to try this product. After about a month of daily usage J had to stop taking it because it was causing weird bumpy breakouts on my temples and made my dark circles under my eyes very prominent. I also inexplicably always had a weird feeling with my energy levels. I have a feeling it has to do with this pill causing an imbalance. Since I've stopped taking them, my complexion has been way better.
customer_reviews.author: Noellex33

customer_reviews.title: Egh...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a little more than a month but I haven't really noticed a difference in my hair which is what I bought it for. Still losing a bunch in the shower and doesn't seem any thicker. Maybe in time this will change... Update... it's been a couple more months now. My hair is slightly thicker but hasn't grown any faster. My nails still break easily. Some people have trouble with breakouts when taking biotin but I did not with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zo

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this after losing tons of hair due to hormone and thyroid medications. My hair is growing back at the rate of 1/2 inch a month which is about normal for me and I am not losing anymore hair. I have never taken extra Biotin but my hairdresser told me I needed to take 10,000 mcg a day to see results. Some days I only take 5,000 mcg because I forget to take it. Overall I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Veteran Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I really believe this product has helped the me maintain ...
customer_reviews.text: I really believe this product has helped the me maintain the quality of my hair and nails well into my 60's. When I am not taking it I notice weakness in both. I also believe the quality of this product is as it claims, I have tried others for far more money and not found the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: This broke me out like crazy, which I know biotin can do sometimes
customer_reviews.text: This broke me out like crazy, which I know biotin can do sometimes.. however other brands I've tried with the same amount never did.. and lord are breakouts painful.. I've never had this problem before! I would say if you use this brand, try to get a lower amount..3 stars because it must be working since I'm getting similar biotin side effects
customer_reviews.author: Alovey

customer_reviews.title: Why not?
customer_reviews.text: I take a little extra biotin for the same reason I take other supplements, as a little added insurance against possible deficiency. Do I know that our foods are deficient in nutrients? No. I don't know anything, for sure, but it makes sense that they could be and taking a little extra doesn't seem to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Skids

product_meta.title: Biotin With 5000 MCG - Extra Strength Vitamin B-Complex Supplement to Improve Hair Growth, Improve Skin Health & Have Thicker Nails - 120 Vegetarian Capsules
product_meta.description: ZENWISE HEALTH BIOTIN is an extra-strength hair supplement featuring 5000mcg of Biotin, an advanced water-soluble B-Complex vitamin that promotes healthy skin, hair, and nail growth for both men and women. Also known as Vitamin B7, Biotin functions as a coenzyme that may help the body metabolize fats, proteins, and carbohydrates to encourage cellular energy production. Taking Biotin supplements may naturally stimulate faster hair regrowth to fight against hair thinning and balding for maximum hair health. This specialized hair care supplement promotes healthy tone and texture of the skin and scalp. Biotin is rich with nutrients that can also help strengthen brittle nail beds for a healthier looking appearance.
feature_bullets: 5000MCG BIOTIN FORMULA - Zenwise Health's Extra Strength Biotin features 5000mcg of Biotin, a B-Complex vitamin that promotes healthy skin, hair growth, and nails, while also supporting metabolism and energy levels. Label design may vary.

NATURAL HAIR GROWTH SUPPORT - These Biotin vitamins encourage thicker, fuller, and shinier looking hair growth for men and women that may struggle with hair loss caused by weak and brittle hair. For more volume and strength, look no further.

SUPPORTS SKIN & NAIL HEALTH - This specialized hair care supplement promotes healthy tone and texture of the skin and scalp. Biotin is rich with nutrients that can also help strengthen brittle nail beds for a healthier looking appearance.

ENERGY BOOSTER BENEFITS - Zenwise Health's 5mg Biotin pills also work as a coenzyme to support metabolism, which helps the body process fats, proteins, and carbs to bolster energy production and keep you feeling your best.

A SUPPLEMENT YOU CAN TRUST - Zenwise Health proudly formulates its 120 count of advanced gluten free Biotin in an enhanced FDA-registered facility that is NSF and GMP certified, and all products are manufactured in the USA.
